titles: A proclamation ordering the whole militia benorth the river of Forth, to be in readiness with fifteen dayes provision, when called out, &c.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His Most Sacred Majesty,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
